dcterms:description: A large-scale, publicly available benchmark tailored for the VI-ReID task, boasting a diverse collection of 491 identities captured across four RGB cameras and two IR cameras, spanning both indoor and outdoor environments. It includes 22,258 RGB images and 11,909 IR images, with a query set of 3,803 IR images and a gallery set of 301 RGB images.
dcterms:title: SYSU-MM01

dcterms:creator: Dat Tien Nguyen
Hyung Gil Hong
Ki-Wan Kim
Kang Ryoung Park
dcterms:description: A dataset captured by a single RGB camera and a single IR camera, featuring 4,120 RGB images and 4,120 IR images, each depicting 412 distinct identities, partitioned into training and testing sets.
dcterms:title: RegDB
